description: On arrival at the Male International Airport, you will get your first taste of warm Maldivian hospitality; the hotels team will welcome you at the Male International Airport and assists you for all for the speedboat check in procedures to ensure you have a smooth arrival and afterward we will proceed to your hotel.

duration: Days 1 -2: New Delhi,India Days 2 - 4: Agra and the Taj Mahal, India
description: New Delhi, India's busy, crowded capital. For an authentic experience New Delhi is not to be missed. Make your way to Agra and take a boat trip along the Yamuna River in the early hours of the morning to see the grand Taj Mahal in all its glory at sunrise.

duration: DHAULAGIRI & ANNAPURNA PANORAMA TREK, Nepal 4 nights
description: Lace up your boots, it's time for the first day of your trek! A private vehicle will pick you up from your hotel and transfer  to Kande. Here you'll meet porters and have a quick briefing. Once everyone is ready, your trek begins!
